title: Mathematics Instructional Design Education Program Preparing for Industry Career Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematical theory knowledge and proficiency in using online learning tools
context.additional_context: Context-based program to strengthen mathematical problem-solving competencies required in industrial settings

learning_goals: Development of practical case analysis and model design capabilities for solving industrial mathematics problems.
Development of collaborative mathematics problem-solving processes using digital tools.
Demonstration of mathematical application skills under conditions similar to real work environments through project-based assessment.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
